##Install this software

{\small http://rprogramming.net/create-html-or-pdf-files-with-r-knitr-miktex-and-pandoc/}

Follow steps **1** and **2**

- install these packages: *knitr*, *rmarkdown*, *shiny*, *devtools*

- install the package *printr*

  with the command: **devtools::install_github( "yihui/printr")**
 

##Find a dataset and bring it the workshop

You will use the dataset to begin to build your own browser-based point-and-click interface for non-programmers to use R. The interface will be built with the **shiny** package.
